name: My sweet chocolate
tags: Animals,Long Strip,Drama,Web Comic,Slice of Life,Full Color
nutshell:
16 year old Choco. A dog close to 80 years of age. The text that flew to my mother during the Christmas Eve overtime work, “Choco hurts a lot.” Choco, who always thought it was natural to be together, became old dog. The third So-jin who spent time now has to prepare for a breakup with Choco.
(Google Translate)

Official Japanese Translation

name: Nomenclature of the night
nutshell: In the blue and purple neon, under the dense steel sky, the front end of the data torrent is the world after the technological revolution, and it is also the boundary between reality and illusion. Steel and body, past and future. Here, the outer world and the inner world coexist, and everything in front of you is like a wall of time. Darkness gradually shrouded. But you have to understand, my friend, that we cannot deal with darkness with tenderness, but with fire.

name: My Aurora
nutshell: The ‘Sleeping Beauty’ who falls asleep during the day is not only a princess, but also an un-aging and immortal witch. The witch, Aurora, has been punished by God and will fall asleep during the day, to wake up only when night falls. In order to break the curse, she and a young man collect light. As the collected light increases, the reasons for Aurora's punishment by God are gradually revealed.

name: Aka no Washupiel
nutshell: NOTE : was released as a stand alone in 1993 by Biblos, and ran in BexBoy Magazine. When Suguro moved to publisher Taiyou Tosho in 1999, she continued the story in their Craft line, and closed it up as part of the second Aka no Washupiel in 2000.

name: How to Tame a Wild Lion
nutshell: A main vocalist with the temper of a lion x a cheerful and straightforward bassist. Who knew that the band couple I fangirl about is actually real! In order to understand and save the band that is on the verge of getting disbanded, he found a child prodigy star, who had to secretly leave the entertainment industry because of a car accident. But, this gangster-like youth, who became a "backside singer" at a bar, how should I tame him? Should I chase after my dream or choose my husband? I want them both!

name: Onmyoji
nutshell:
Must we believe in ancient legends? In mythical tales and characters?
As a child, Abe-no-Seimei in the company of his master Kamo Tadayuki walks his first steps on the paths frequented by evil spirits and angry souls of darkness with a thousand spells. Seimei, who can feel an evil entity approaching before anyone else, is taken in by Tadayuki, who sees in him an exceptional talent for the practices of Yin and Yang.
From that day on, Seimei was made his disciple and was taught all his secrets.

name: Heaven's Souls
nutshell: The world has plunged into a new threat. Alien creatures are wreaking havoc and there is only one team who can stop them. This is the story of valiant heroines fighting against these alien foes. Want to know more?Stay tuned, get ready, and watch them battle on!

name: Monster Soul
nutshell: The tale of Monster Soul takes place in Elfenland, which is inhabited by both humans and monsters. The main characters are a group of monsters called the Black Airs. The Black Airs is recorded as the strongest group of the monster forces in the great war between the humans and monsters.

name: Pantser Princess
nutshell: The Kingdom of Commons is a continent located in North Arcadia. Mitia Commons is the princess of the kingdom, and she is so extremely shy that she has barely ever ventured outside of the castle. Now, out of the blur, her mother, the queen, declares that she must go through a ritual in order to become qualified for the throne. The ritual requires that Mitia to collect four powerful stones to complete a magical staff. By doing so, she will overcome her extreme shyness. She embarks on an adventure with her friend and bodyguard, Atty and Sasha, in order to search for these four stones.

name: Attack!!
nutshell: Harutaka Kato, 1st grade students in Kakegawa high school with the extraordinary ability to jump. After look at his ability, Maiko the volleyball club manager's kept urging him to join as. Finally, Harutaka persuaded to enter the club. However, volleyball club had another star, Yuta Kaneko! Harutaka upset and trying to show off. But, all of his smash managed to block by Yuta!! So, what will Harutaka do!?

name: I Tried to Turn Down a Confession from a Beautiful Girl
Model
nutshell:
Jae is a Korean student who came to Europe to study art. Things aren't going her way, but she's determined to make it. One night, her friend Melissa brings a drunk guy to her apartment and asks if he can stay there for the night. Jae doesn't like it, but agrees. That night she has a dream that the drunk guy drinks her blood… which, of course, turns out NOT to be a dream.
Jae is surprisingly unafraid of the vampire, Michael, and starts to paint his portrait. The two strike an unusual deal: if Jae allows the vampire to feed on her, he will pose for her. His beauty and alluring preternatural energy could be exactly what Jae needs to finally succeed as a painter.

name: December Rain
nutshell: Fresh out of the army, Suchae decides to take some time off and travel around the country by himself. On the first day of his trip, he spots a guy who looks totally his type at a rundown bus terminal. The only problem is, it?s the same guy who was jerking off in the bathroom 5 minutes ago. Despite the possibility of him being a creep, however, Suchae is drawn to the mysterious stranger. He finds everything about him…arousing. Who is this stranger? And why is he on the road?

name: Go Nagai's Samurai World
nutshell: This is Nagai Go's period drama world, a total of 10 volumes of Science Fiction stories inspired mainly from the Tatsukawa Book Collection. Psychic wars unfold in the world of the Warring States period as the heroes of stories make full use of sorcery, ninjutsu, and supernatural powers!

name: My Broken Vampire
nutshell: Itsuki is a female college student who has lived desperately with her younger brother and sister after their parents abandoned them. It was Yo-chan, a young boy who first took care of her after she had been abused and abandoned."Itsuki-chan will be my princess." Wait a second!? The meal is mouth-to-mouth!? But I've never even had a lover...

name: Her
nutshell:
HER is a series of character portraits, loosely strung together by everyday circumstances.
The story begins with a woman who wants to be loveable - and loved - and who has a fixation on shoes. Her hairdresser's fear of the future is the subject of the second chapter. A schoolgirl whose hair she cuts sees her older female neighbor kissing her female lover goodbye. In the past, the neighbor had a difficult relationship with her mother. The neighbor's lover was rejected by her first love. The couple sitting next to them at the cafe have their own issues.

name: Ingress GO
nutshell: A webcomic about Ingress players. Inspired by true stories. Full of XM, drama and smurf tears.

name: Moichido Kare to
nutshell: Eight years after they suddenly broke up, Rise Higano ran into her first love Shizuki Tachibana once again. After saving her from a stalker, Shizuki confessed that he still has feelings for Rise. Now that they're both adults, can they make it work this time?

name: Hard & Loose: Shiritsu Tantei Toki Shouzou Trouble Note
nutshell: A detective thriller in which former boxer Shozo is thrown into a web of intrigue when he picks up a ringing phone in a room whose occupant he is supposed to be following.

name: Raising a Human cat
nutshell: The story of how to raise a humat cat.

name: Gao Chang and Rhubarb
nutshell: As Gao Chang was dying, he was full of guilt and regret for having abandoned his dog. After Gao Chang got the chance to relive his life, he decided that this time he would take care of his dog Rhubarb, only to then discover that Rhubarb was the descendant of celestial canines! What kind of perks come with being buddies with a divine dog? Cultivation, naturally. But Rhubarb says that his people's cultivation methods were not to be taught to outsiders, and if Gao Chang wanted to learn, then they would first have to get married.

name: Tiananmen Square
nutshell:
The world's first comic masterpiece to fully illustrate the Tiananmen Square Incident! The intensity is comparable to that of "The Silent Fleet"! If you love military, history and care about the future, you can't miss it! In June 1989, Morrell, an American journalist, was in Tiananmen Square looking for subjects and mingling with the students in order to cover this once-in-a-lifetime student event in Chinese history. However, on June 4, the square, which was full of forward-looking energy, turned into a bloody and brutal killing field ……! Professors who were baptized by the Cultural Revolution, brothers who were guards at the square and protesting students, top Chinese officials such as Zhao Ziyang, Deng Xiaoping, Yao Yilin and Li Peng, as well as the U.S. government, Taiwan and the world, use a mixture of fiction and reality, together with rigorous historical evidence, to portray the premature arrival of the democratic wave in China from the perspective of all walks of life, the coldest summer of 1989. It has been 17 years since the Tiananmen Square Incident, which has had a huge impact on democratic thinking in modern China and which cannot be ignored in the analysis of the Chinese economy, took place in 1989. Although many written records have been published, no pictorial works have ever been created with this event as the main axis. Since the creators in Hong Kong, China, are unable to create such a theme due to political factors, and the creators in the United States and Japan are not clear about the circumstances, we are the only ones left in the world who can challenge the theme of "Tiananmen Incident". Therefore, we tried to reinterpret the "Tiananmen Incident", an event that brought a great impact to China and the world, by using the most easily understood and impressive comic book technique. The book is divided into four chapters, each presenting a comprehensive and objective analysis of the Tiananmen Incident in four directions: general, student, senior government, and world. The detailed and rigorous historical and military examinations, as well as the complete timeline of the June Fourth Incident in the appendix at the end of the book, make this book highly valuable as a source of information. It is a must-read for understanding modern China. (MTL'd description)
Retail: Google Play

name: Kyou, Sekai Ichi no Kokuhaku wo.
nutshell:
From Batoto Scans :
A ‘confession’ is that moment when you become special to the person you love...
“It’s not a Special Confession” - Valentine's Day with a classmate.
“Deciding not to Confess” - I decided not to confess because I want to be with you.
“The End of Summer and the Missing Confession” - Reuniting with the person who confessed to me a long time ago.
“The Confession was made after a Happy Ending” - I confessed my feelings for the third time, and we ended up going out, but...
A collection of 4 short stories about pure confessions from each season!
Note: The series was first published under the title "Kimi ga Suki tte Iitai" in Dessert Pink.

name: Kowamochi-kun wa Neko ni Muchuu
nutshell:
Yuno Shiraishi was worried about her relationship with her senior who goes to the same university. He doesn't wear condom when they are having sex. She tried to talk about it with him at a pub, but he said, "Then, do you want to break up?" At that moment, a tough-looking handsome waiter who was watching the whole story throws beer on him, and the two of them are kicked out of the pub...
Yuno, who is at loss, meet a white cat when she goes to a shrine. "If you want to get out of your situation, what about becoming a cat?" Yuno, who has turned into a cat crying in surprise, appears in front of the pub waiter (Takashi). She was afraid that he might be a scary person, but he clumsily gently picks up Yuno (the cat) and takes her home...

Tokyo in the Taisho Era, when Japan made a strong move towards modernization. Len, the eldest son of the Kagurazaka family, wants nothing more than to prevent his sister, Rin, from entering an arranged marriage. As a last resort, he goes in search of the urban legend of a ghost train that will grant any wish. Not only does he find it, but in order to grant his wish, the train's conductor, Miku, charges him an incredibly high amount of money…?! Chiho, the artist behind the original visuals, makes her manga debut in this manga adaptation of the song known for its mournful melody, atmosphere, and fun word-play!!

name: Jupiter
nutshell: It's been 11 years since Levan tried to ignore his alter ego. As time goes by, he then realizes that there are weird things that revolved around his alter ego. Will Levan be able to live like a normal person daily?

name: BaBaBylon
nutshell:
There was a time when the children of the God King walked upon this Earth. This ended after the events of the Great Flood, which banished the gods back into the heavens. However, their half-human descendants continued to live on the mortal plane.
We find ourselves in Ancient Mesopotamia. Ninutu, descendant of the god Ninurta, meets a girl from a faraway land, on her way to meet the legendary King Nimrod. She hopes to convince him to end his occupation of her homeland. Impelled by this, Ninutu goes to face her oldest royal nemesis once and for all.

name: Katekyo Hitman Reborn! dj - Hokenshitsu de Jugyouchuu!
nutshell: Pairing: Hibari x Tsuna

name: Stealth Symphony
nutshell:
In a world where elves, dwarves, and invisible dragons live in harmony inside a metropolitan city, Sieg sets out to find someone or something that can unleash the curse that he carries on his back. As he attempts to survive in the city of Jinbocho, a city filled with fantastic secrets and organizations, he encounters many powerful individuals who set out to either destroy him or save him. Will Sieg be able to discover the true secret of his curse, or will it lead him to his own demise?
Volume 1 contains the original one-shot as a prologue chapter.

name: Naruto: Road to Ninja
nutshell: ROAD TO NINJA NARUTO THE MOVIE The new shocking movie Naruto fans from all over the world have been waiting for. MOVIE 9: ROAD TO NARUTO THE MOVIE A special one-shot connected to the movie!? Read the manga, watch the movie and find the connections!!

name: Barairo Mitsubachi
nutshell: After the untimely death of his parents, Tachibana Academy's chancellor takes Aoi under his wing. Though Aoi is now a student there, he still hasn't met the chancellor. Meanwhile, Aoi is being pursued by his bully teacher, Sakurai, and falls in love with him! Is Sakurai the chancellor? Aoi always wonders since Sakurai wears the same rose scent as the chancellor. Will this honeybee be able to resist such a sweet trap?
